official_title: A bill to prohibit the importation into the United States of pistols and revolvers and parts thereof.

summary.text: Prohibits the importation into the United States of any pistol or revolver and any part of any pistol or revolver.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the importation into the United States of pistols and revolvers and parts thereof.
